column4: I've got a 900A EEE with only a 4G SSD and 8GSD card. Oneiric is too big for it. What's the best ubuntu-like distro for it?

server supposedly takes up 1gb, plus install X then a WM + gui apps + swap file(depending on ram you may not need it if you don't use hibernate) and your 4gb is mostly filled up then 8gb for storage etc
ubuntu server, my suggestion is a lot of work though, prob 45mins
